segments.text: This scene holds a secret, and it's quite an interesting one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently doing her chores, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, those two children are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly trying to get cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of childhood mischief, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on grabbing those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is acting as a lookout and eager accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see the forbidden delight on their faces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should really ask for permission first, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit rude to take things without asking the adult in charge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, there's a certain charm to their cooperative stealth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll probably get a telling off if they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But for now, they are masters of their cookie domain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall off that stool in their excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR
